column5: Any suggestions for stuff to bring for Minnitaki? By this I mean lures, rigs, etc. that are doing well this year. It is not easy to get this year's hot lure once we are there. We usually mostly jig vertically, also plan to do more bottom-bouncing and crankbait trolling this year. Many thanks.

We did well with bottom bouncers at least 1 oz. Rainbow colored spinners with colorado blades tipped with night crawler. We also used jigs tipped with plastic grub and crawler. most fishermen were jigging seemed like that was working for most people.
